data.expected_outcome: Define episode threshold, store refs not outputs, implement evaluation rubric
data.actual_outcome: Episode system operational with small JSON refs. Evaluation rubric with outcome_quality scores working. Average duration 0.27 mins (smoke tests are fast).
data.next_action: Apply episode tracking to real multi-step tasks (not just smoke tests)
data.notes: Spec implemented correctly. Needs real-world validation beyond smoke tests to fully prove out.
